href="/store/apps/details?id=tw.com.gleeshare.ccw" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=tw.com.gleeshare.ccw" title="國會Online-立院監督"> 330.    國會Online-立院監督  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=GleeShare+Inc." title="GleeShare Inc.">GleeShare Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="tw.com.gleeshare.ccw"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFHR3LmNvbS5nbGVlc2hhcmUuY2N3EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  對立法院亂象感到無奈？每次選舉總是苦惱該分辨誰才是好立委？想落實監督，卻不知從何下手？公民監督國會聯盟的「國會Online」APP網羅了所有你需要的資訊，讓你輕鬆掌握立法院！<br>　<br>「國會Online-立院監督」APP為一監督國會、促進國會資訊透明化之手機軟體，共分成下列幾個項目：<br>　<br>一、監督國會：<br>　<br>(1)最新消息─公民不僅僅只是四年一次的投票權行使，更是日常生活中落實的監督和民主參與。若你也認同「坐而言不如起而行」，卻苦於不知該從何做起，快來看看「最新消息」裡的近期監督國會有哪些，協助將活動訊息轉發、熱烈響應我們吧！:)<br>　<br>(2)認識立院─對立法院複雜的組織感到困擾？想了解立法院卻不知從何開始？「認識立院」透過四個簡單的Q&amp;A，讓大家都能輕鬆且快速的了解立法院運作方式！<br>　<br>二、會議週報<br>　<br>立法院每週都會公告會議訊息，可是往往又長又複雜。「會議週報」幫你把每個星期的會議訊息整理的簡單扼要，讓你們快速了解每週有哪些議題正在被討論、哪些法案或預算正在進行審查。<br>　<br>三、立委評鑑<br>　<br>每次選舉總是苦惱要選誰嗎？每次到了要投票才發現不知道各個候選人過去四年的表現如何嗎？不想落於藍綠或意識形態之爭，卻不知如何判斷起誰是好立委？每個立委都說自己「清新、效能、專業」，到底該相信誰？<br>　<br>公督盟想請你來參考我們的立委評鑑！我們從第七屆起，開始在立法院每個會期結束後舉辦立委評鑑。邀請學者專家、公民團體、媒體代表、公民代表等，針對立委的問政表現進行評量。不管是立委的出缺席、發言情況，到法案提案、預算把關、陽光公益法案的推行，都是我們評量立委的指標項目。<br>　<br>四年下來，立法委員前後會受到八次立委評鑑的檢驗。有別於選舉時各宣傳文宣的只褒不貶，公督盟的立委評鑑是每半年就舉辦一次，意在為民眾監督、檢視立法委員的實在參考依據。<br>　<br>四、立委通訊<br>　<br>你常常看到環保團體、婦女團體、勞工團體等公民團體跟你說「請跟選區立委反應！」「請向選區立委抗議！」卻不知道自己選區的立委聯絡方式、甚至不知道自己選區的立委到底是誰嗎？「立委通訊」可以讓你從「姓名」搜尋、「委員會」搜尋、也可以從「選區」搜尋！就是要讓你簡單快速找到你要的立委聯絡方式！<br>　<br>五、關於我們<br>　<br>我們是「社團法人公民監督國會聯盟」（簡稱「公督盟」），於2007年4月18日，由40多個包括教育、人權、環境、婦女等民間團體共同組成。柏拉圖說：「拒絕參與政治的懲罰之一，就是被糟糕的人統治。」，而公督盟的成立，就是要讓人民的監督力量得以展現。在「關於我們」項下，還有更多關於我們的介紹喔！:)<br>　<br>　<br>公督盟官網：http://www.ccw.org.tw/<br>公督盟臉書：https://www.facebook.com/ccw.org.tw<br>公督盟youtube：http://www.youtube.com/user/ccworg 332.    The Economist World in Figures  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=The+Economist+Newspaper+Limited" title="The Economist Newspaper Limited">The Economist Newspaper Limited</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.economist.wif"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS5lY29ub21pc3Qud2lmEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  •A data-rich compendium of country indices and rankings on the economy and society <br>•Our intellectually-addictive Factquest quiz game and a new Fact of the Day every morning<br>•A country comparison tool, Chartmaker, that lets you create your own charts from the data<br>•New content from The Economist newspaper, updated weekly<br>•Free to download with access to country data, rankings and the Factquest quiz game to non-subscribers<p>The Economist World in Figures app with the Factquest quiz game is a fun, data-rich reference guide for the businessperson, educator and stats geek alike. It teems with indicators on 190 countries, as well as dozens of rankings ranging from birth rates and patents to Nobel prize winners and GDP. The Factquest quiz game tests your knowledge of worldly stats. The Fact of the Day lets you start each morning a bit smarter. And data-driven articles from The Economist are updated weekly.</p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.economist.wif" aria-hidden="true" Doc Bao Tong Hop  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ITus+Studio" title="ITus Studio">ITus Studio</a>  </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  中国钢笔书法杂志社是共青团浙江省委直属的事业单位，杂志创办于1985年，是全国硬笔书法界唯一的公开发行刊物，总发行量已突破1500万份，在国内外享有很高的美誉。其权威性、艺术性深受业内专家的认可。<p>《中国钢笔书法》杂志以弘扬传统文化，提高全民族文化素质，提高人民群众，尤其是广大青少年的汉字书写水平为宗旨，读者遍布全国各地，在东南亚、欧美也拥有不少的读者群，深受全国硬笔书法爱好者，中小学生的厚爱。曾创下月发行量达40万份、拥有数百万读者的宏伟业绩。</p> 371.    Palabre (News, RSS, Feedly)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=LevelUp+Studio" title="LevelUp Studio">LevelUp Studio</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.levelup.palabre"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHQobEhkKE2NvbS5sZXZlbHVwLnBhbGFicmUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Palabre 是一款独特的 RSS 新闻及 Feedly 阅读器。如果你曾经用过 Plume （一款 Twitter 客户端）、Beautiful Widgets 和 Bright Weather 的话，你会喜欢上它的！<p>这款应用使用了 Material 设计，如果你有看过截图，你就会知道我们为了打造这样一款干净、漂亮、易用的新闻阅读器，投入了多少心血。试试吧！<br> <br>特性<br>- RSS 支持<br>- 支持从 Feedly 完全同步文章<br>- Material 设计，兼有优雅的动画效果<br>- 美观的多种视图，包括杂志式、大卡片式及列表式<br>- 离线支持（可选仅在充电时缓存）<br>- 可滚动的小工具，包括 4x2 和 1x1 两种样式<br>- 再排班支持<br>- 新文章通知，可以选择什么类别或站点的新文章才会触发通知<br>- 可选仅在 Wi-Fi 下加载图片，且可在需要时点击占位符来加载图片<br>- 可选在自带或第三方浏览器中阅读全文<br>- 多样的阅读字体设置，如大小、字体样式、行距、文字排班及亮度<br>- 管理你的新闻来源及分类<br>- 浏览最受欢迎的文章（仅限 Feedly）<br>- 可在文章中搜索<br>- 可手动或在滚过时将文章标为已读<br>- 更改阅读顺序（从老的或新的文章开始）<br>- 黑色主题<br>- 支持收藏文章以备稍后再读<br>- 轻松分享文章<br>- 支持 Android Wear 设备<br>- 快速分享到 Pocket、Instapaper 和即时聊天工具<br>- 增强的分享选项</p><p>更多的特性即将来领！你可以在 http://feedback.levelupstudio.com/forums/281266-palabre/filters/top class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.noinnion.android.newsplus" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.noinnion.android.newsplus" title="News+ | Google News RSS Reader"> 378.    News+ | Google News RSS Reader  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=noinnion" title="noinnion">noinnion</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.noinnion.android.newsplus"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS5ub2lubmlvbi5hbmRyb2lkLm5ld3NwbHVzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Brought to you by the creators of gReader.<br>Difference between News+ and gReader: http://newsplus.co/difference-between-newsplus-and-greader<p>*** About News+ (Google News)***</p><p>Since Google has decided to shutdown Google Reader, lots of new and innovative RSS services have arose to light. Many of those services appeared as worthy replacements, and even an upgrade. We couldn’t choose just one or two, and we also had to make some decisions about how our work will continue. We decided not to pick! We created a new app that is the successor of gReader, taking it’s features and functionality but supports as many reading services as possible: News+.</p><p><br>*** Simple, fast and intuitive ***</p><p>Our goal was to create a news reader with the best possible reading experience. Our users LOVED how customizable gReader is, and it made sense because a lot of the feature ideas came from the community itself. So, on News+ users can also quickly read their feeds in a simple and intuitive user interface. Article pages can be reduced to the minimum of just the main contents, so that a reader could just concentrate on, well… reading! Consuming content at places without an internet connection is also possible using the great offline Reading features. You can also let News+ read your news to you when out laud, leaving your hands free for other tasks. These and many more features could be found on the features page, at http://newsplus.co/features/.</p><p><br>*** Why choose just one service? Supporting extensions in News+ ***</p><p>The power of News+ is as an aggregator. We took gReader’s functional features and added the ability to expand News+ with extensions. Not just for RSS services, but Read Later services as well (Pocket, Readability or Instapaper), and news websites could be integrated too. We plan on integrating more and more services to News+, making it a one-stop-shop for all your news and articles needs. In a single, unified user interface, you can now read and consume content from various different services, and the list will just get bigger and bigger.</p><p>Extensions are independent app that can be created and published by everyone. News+ recognized the extensions by itself and shows them directly in the app. Here is a list of current services News+ supports:</p><p>* Google News<br>* Feedly<br>* The Old Reader<br>* InoReader<br>* Bazqux<br>* Tiny Tiny Rss<br>* FeedBin<br>* NewsBlur<br>* SubReader<br>* Reedah<br>* CommaReader<br>* Pocket</p><p>Finally, we encourage the News+ community to create extension, and have them published to everyone!</p><p>*** Links ***</p><p>Homepage: http://newsplus.co<br>API Documentation and Extension source codes: https://github.com/noinnion/newsplus<br>Forum: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/news_plus<br>Play Store (beta): https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.noinnion.android.newsplus<br>News+ is an app with Google News features.<br>https://github.com/noinnion/newsplus</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Đọc báo - Tin tức nóng 24h  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Tornado+Studio" title="Tornado data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tornado.docbao"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEmNvbS50b3JuYWRvLmRvY2JhbxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Đọc báo (doc bao) là ứng dụng đọc báo tổng hợp từ tất cả các trang báo mạng tại Việt Nam.<p>NHỮNG TÍNH NĂNG NỔI BẬT CỦA ĐỌC BÁO (DOC BAO):<br>- Đọc báo (doc bao), tin tức (tin tuc) hoàn toàn miễn phí, cực nhanh và nhẹ, không SMS<br>- Thông tin nhanh và mới nhất về tình hình trong nước và quốc tế<br>- Dễ dàng chia sẻ với bạn bè<br>- Thiết kế tối ưu giúp bạn thao tác đọc báo (doc bao) cực kỳ đơn giản.<br>- Tối ưu cho tất cả các kết nối mạng GPRS, EDGE, 3G, WIFI.<br>- Chức năng không tải ảnh giúp bạn tiết kiệm dung lượng băng thông.<br>- Hỗ trợ cả chế độ xoay ngang và cầm dọc, tương thích với mọi điện thoại và máy tính bảng.<br>- Tin tức (tin tuc) được tổng hợp và cập nhật liên tục. <br>- Giao diện đẹp, dễ sử dụng.<br>- Tính năng lưu tin giúp bạn xem lại những tin tức (tin tuc) hay nhanh hơn bao giờ hết.<br>- Các chuyên mục tin tức (tin tuc) rất đầy đủ và khoa học, như : tin nóng (tin nong), thể thao (tin the thao), thế giới (tin the gioi), pháp luật (phap luat)...<br>- Bài viết và tin tức (tin tuc) được chọn lọc ở tất cả các báo uy tín giúp bạn đọc báo (doc bao) dễ dàng nhất :<br>VnExpress, Dân trí (dan tri), Zing News, VietnamNet, 24h, Tiền phong Online, Tinh tế (tinh te), Công an nhân dân (cong an), Ngôi sao (ngoi sao), Afamily, VietnamPlus ...</p><p>Tags: U19 Việt Nam, Ngoại hạng anh, Ukraine, Hot, Tin tức, đọc báo, báo mới, tin nhanh tức thời, người đưa tin, dantri </div>  <div class="description">  新聞が全紙無料で読める！<br>日経・朝日・毎日などの大手新聞やスポーツ新聞などマス媒体の記事が全て無料でまとめて読めるニュースアプリです。<br>記事の一覧はtwitter・facebook・はてなブックマークでのシェア状況を集計し、人気の記事が一目でわかるようになっています。<br>シンプルなデザインでメディア媒体ごとに記事を表示するか否かの設定をすることが可能です（*1）<br>ぜひこの機会に一度無料で読める新聞(しんぶん）をご利用ください！<p>ユーザーの皆様の意見をもとによりよいアプリに改善してまいります。</p><p>●掲載メディア媒体<br>　・日本経済新聞（日経新聞）<br>　・毎日新聞<br>　・読売新聞<br>　・産経新聞<br>　・東洋経済新聞<br>　・日刊スポーツ新聞<br>　・日刊工業新聞<br>　・東京新聞<br>　・ロイター通信<br>　・東京IT新聞　など</p><p>●主な機能<br>　・人気集計機能<br>　　―新聞社の各記事をTwitterのRetweet数・Facebookのいいね数<br>　　　・はてなブックマーク数から集計しています<br>　・サイト設定（*1）<br>　　－メディア媒体ごとに記事表示設定可能です<br>　・ブックマーク機能<br>　　－記事をブックマークすることが可能です。<br>　　　一覧から長押しか、記事詳細ページでメニューボタンから<br>　　　　お気に入りに追加することが可能です<br>　・キーワード検索<br>　　－新聞社の記事をキーワード検索することが可能です<br>　　　同一テーマの記事を比べ読みするときなどに役立ちます<br>　・共有機能<br>　　－twitterやfacebookなどに簡単に記事を共有できます<br>　・本日の人気記事を通知する機能<br>　　－通知機能の設定は「設定」の「通知設定」から変更可能です</p><p>●こんな方におすすめです！<br>　・新聞（しんぶん）が読みたいけど有料購読をされていない方<br>　・隙間時間に時事ネタを抑えておきたいビジネスマンや就活生<br>　<br>無料で読める新聞の決定版！この機会にぜひご利用ください！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Journal Company Limited">Hong Kong Economic Journal Company Limited</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-server-cookie="CAIaEgoQEg4KCGNvbS5oa2VqEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  如果您想在開始一天的工作之前了解香港、中國及國際財經大事的脈搏,以及城中最重要的評論分析,您可以用Android手機及平版電腦看信報流動版。<p>信報流動版為您選編一系列大事精粹,提供源源不絕的財經資訊、即時新聞、股市消息和分析評論,是您每一天不可或缺的精神食糧。</p><p>除了免費的精華版,「信報網上版」訂戶亦可利用您的Android裝置登入並瀏覽內容更多更豐富的訂戶版。</p><p>《信報》流動版的內容包括「今日信報」的九大分類:</p><p>要聞<br>理財投資<br>信報評論<br>財經新聞<br>地產市道<br>獨眼‧政治<br>兩岸國際<br>體育消息<br>生活藝術</p><p>另外, 我們還為您提供:<br>昔日「信報」 --- 提供過去6天「今日信報」內容，方便用戶隨時瀏覽；<br>即時新聞 --- 每日最新的本地及環球新聞資訊，上市公司最新通告等；<br>市場走勢 --- 貼市的財經資訊, 包括恆指、股票即時報價及六個月走勢圖、中國及國際各主要股票市場的指數、外匯及貴金屬價格等。用戶更可儲存多至六十隻股票於三個自選組合內；<br>其它特色 --- 全新版面設計，支援垂直或橫屏閱讀；可自選4種不同背景顏色，文章字體可彈性調整大細；下載「今日信報」內容時，可同步開始閱讀詳文；自動清除舊有緩存資料，節省儲存空間。</p><p>《信報》在1973年7月創刊,與香港經濟同步成長,是本港最早一份以專業財經資訊為主、深入分析時事的中文報刊;根據香港中文大學新聞及傳播學院在1998、2001及2006年的調查,《信報》均獲得新聞同業評定為最具公信力的報紙之一。近年大中華經濟區迅速崛興,《信報》在海峽兩岸及華人社區同樣贏得口碑,享有財經權威的信譽。</p><p>《信報》高舉自由市場經濟,尊重知識與財富創造,為讀者提供清晰廣闊的視野和不同角度的分析,與時並進,捕捉最新潮流,為您提供無窮的智慧。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> kết quả lô các cặp số về ít nhất, nhiều trong khoảng thời gian nào đó<br>- Bảng thông kê kết quả giúp bạn soi cầu lô tô chính xác cho tất cả các tỉnh thành.</p><p></p><p></p> <span 这是一个帮助你发现生活何以美好的商业新闻应用。<p>所有内容均原创或者邀请专业作者撰写。</p><p>报道涉及智能、设计、城市、时尚和娱乐等领域。全部都建立在商业视角之上。</p><p>它的重要特色包括：</p><p>TOP 15 公司，《好奇心日报》选定的 15 家（也可能更多）生活方式公司作为重要报道对象，这其中包括苹果、Google、百度、腾讯、阿里巴巴、优衣库、星巴克等。它们就像 19 世纪的铁路、20 世纪初的汽车一样，吸引全社会的财富、智慧和新技术应用等向这两个行业倾斜。《好奇心日报》相信现在生活方式公司现在某种意义上就具备了这样的指标意义。<br>生活研究所，研究消费和行为的互动性栏目，“线上焦点小组”。我们希望知道你如何看待这个世界。<br>10 个图：用若干张图表来解读商业世界里发生了什么，公司真相。<br>长文章：不用多说，这个世界值得静心去读的好文章和知识是永恒的。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.qdaily.ui" Data有數據，才是王道!<p>【網路，是有溫度的】<br>有人說，網路科技的普及，讓人和人之間少了面對面接觸，失去了熱度。是嗎？<br>其實，當你在FB、Blog抒發心情時，朋友的關心卻讓你心頭暖暖的。<br>當你在PTT爬文，鄉民推文讓你笑到臉紅流眼淚，才發現同好還真多啊！<br>甚至，在網路上樂於潛水的你，透過網路串聯動員，號召數十萬的人民，一同走上街頭！<br>你感受到了嗎？</p><p>這些不可思議的熱情，都是網路上的溫度。 </p><p>【網路大數據觀測方式】<br>我們在不同時間點、不同頻道來源，找出最熱門、最關鍵、最受關注的網路文章，利用不同關鍵字進行語意情緒判斷，交叉分析出令人意想不到的「網路大數據」。 我們每天提供一則「時事網路大數據」，有正經事、不正經事，就是要讓你長知識！</p><p>【網路大資料庫從哪裡來?】<br>我們的系統，觀測了近萬個網站頻道(而且不斷增加中!)，包括新聞頻道、FB、PTT及各大討論區、部落格......</p><p>【網路情緒怎麼計算?】<br>我們運用「語意情緒判斷」技術，讓每一項字詞或整段文字都有情緒分數，這些分數就是情緒正負值。<br>看懂了嗎? 網路上出現人事時地物的「網路情緒」，其實都是我們一起在留言「打分數」的累積!!!</p><p>取之於鄉民，用之於鄉民！如果你覺得有什麼好時事、好題材，想要DailyView一起來綜合 分析「網路大數據」，看看其他網友的意見，快寫信給我們!</p><p>與其相信一個人的意見，還不如相信數百萬筆的資料<br>網路Big Yahoo!リアルタイム検索　~Twitter検索の決定版！  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Yahoo+Japan+Corp." title="Yahoo Japan Corp.">Yahoo Japan Corp.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.yahoo.android.ybuzzdetection"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImpwLmNvLnlhaG9vLmFuZHJvaWQueWJ1enpkZXRlY3Rpb24QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ◆新機能「遅延なう」って何？<br>使い方はカンタン！<br>「電車遅延」や「運転見合わせ」など、運行状況にトラブルがある場合や遅延に関するツイートが急増した場合に、路線ごとの運行情報がリアルタイムに表示されます。いつも利用する路線を登録しておくと遅延情報をお知らせします。<p>世の中の「いま」が分かる！<br>ニュース、芸能ネタ、ゲーム、ドラマ、アニメやスポーツなど、世の中で「いま」盛り上がってる話題はなにか、このアプリがあれば必ず分かる！</p><p>◆Yahoo!リアルタイム検索アプリとは<br>ログイン不要、無料でTwitter（ツイッター）とFacebook（フェイスブック）のツイートをまとめて検索できるYahoo!リアルタイム検索の公式アプリ。<br>検索だけではなく、TwitterやFacebookで盛り上がっているニュースや画像、面白ネタなど話題の情報をコンパクトにまとめてお知らせ。</p><p>◆こんな使い方<br>（１）いまのトレンドを知りたい<br>TwitterやFacebookでたくさん投稿がある話題や注目のニュースをランキング形式でまとめて知れます。ほぼリアルタイムにランキングが更新されるのでいつでも最新の情報がチェックでき、待ち時間などの暇つぶしにも役立ちます。</p><p>（２）友達や職場での会話のネタを探したい<br>Twitterでリツートが多いつぶやきや、ついっぷる、instagramの画像がまとめて見れます。面白い投稿をするカリスマが発見できるかも！</p><p>（３）みんなの反応が知りたい<br>話題のドラマを見ながら、スポーツの実況中継を見ながら、電撃ニュースを見ながら・・・気になる話題を検索するとみんなの反応や感情がリアルタイムに分かります。</p><p>（４）毎日きまった情報を探したい<br>大好きなアイドルの追っかけ情報、いつ出現するか分からないゲームのキャラクター情報、お得なショッピング情報、売り切れていたコンサートのチケットの交換に関する情報など逃したくキーワードをお気に入りに登録しておくだけで、TwitterやFacebookに投稿されるとお知らせします。</p><p>（５）災害や天気、遅延など生活情報が知りたい<br>地震や豪雨、台風などの速報、最新の天候を知りたい、路線の遅延や交通渋滞や事故の様子について知りたい、人気のお店や花火の混雑を知りたいなど生活に密着したリアルタイムな情報を検索するのにも便利です。</p><p>◆こんな情報を知るのに便利<br>・スクープや面白い動画も見逃さない！<br>・ヤフーテレビと連携しているのでテレビ番組ごとにチェック！　<br>・テレビを見れなくても野球やサッカー、駅伝などの実況も！<br>・ツイッター、facebook、Line、Kakao talk（カカオトーク）にも連携。面白ネタを見つけたら、お友達にすぐ共有！</p><p><br>▽紹介されたメディア<br>日経新聞、CNET、ITmedia、インターネットウォッチ、ASCII.jp、インターネットコム、RBB TODAY、マーケジン、ガジェット通信、BCNランキング、通販通信、MOBILE&amp;APPS、週刊アスキーPLUS、産経アプリスタ、SAPpp、マイナビ</p><p>【推奨環境】 <br>Android　2.3以上<br> <br>【利用規約】 <br>■yahoo! ■おすすめ機能■<br>・紙の新聞そのままのイメージを読むことができる「紙面ビューアー機能」が利用できます。東京本社発行の最終版紙面のほか、東京、名古屋、大阪、西部（福岡）の各本社発行の紙面も読むことができます。バックナンバーは当日を含め7日間です<br>・「記事検索」で過去1年分の記事を何度でも調べ放題です<br>・キーワードを登録すると、その言葉を含むニュースを自動で収集してくれる「MYキーワード」がご利用いただけます<br>・保存しておきたい記事は、「スクラップブック」に登録しておくことで、他のモバイル端末やパソコンなどからも、後でじっくり読むことができます<p>■ご利用上の注意■<br>・すべての機能をお使いになるには、朝日新聞社が運営する決済・認証サービス「Jpass」と「朝日新聞デジタル」の有料会員登録が必要です<br>・「朝日新聞デジタル」の無料会員にご登録いただくと、記事を1日3本までお読みいただけます（利用できる機能は限定されます）<br>・お申し込み、およびサービスの詳細については、朝日新聞デジタル総合ガイド（http://digital.asahi.com/info/）をご覧ください</p><p>■操作方法■<br>・通信環境下でお使いになれるサービスです。コンテンツのダウンロードは、Wi-Fiのご利用を推奨します<br>・アプリを起動後、最初の画面「ホーム画面」に「最新の紙面」と「トップニュース」を表示します<br>・画面下部メニューの「紙面を読む」から、各本社の紙面が読めます<br>・画面下部メニューの「速報ニュース」から、ジャンル別に分類したリアルタイムのニュースがご覧になれます<br>・「ホーム画面」を下にスクロールすると表示される「機能一覧」から、「スクラップ」や「記事検索」などの機能がご利用になれます<br>・ご不明な点は「Q＆A（よくある質問）」（http://faq.digital.asahi.com/category/show/223）をご参照ください</p><p>※1 classeur, en sauvegardant vos articles favoris ;<br>•  des alertes personnalisées ;<br>•  de la possibilité de réagir ;<br>•  du journal Le Monde et de ses suppléments partout, sur tous les écrans, géolocalisée, votre blog, vos réactions.</p><p>Abonnez-vous directement à partir de l'application !</p><p>Nous sommes à l’écoute de nos lecteurs</p><p>Si vous avez une question, ou que vous rencontrez Wear!"> 460.    WeaRSS - RSS News on Wear!  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%7Bcreative:drewy%7D" title="{creative:drewy}">{creative:drewy}</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.creativedrewy.wearss"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5jcmVhdGl2ZWRyZXd5LndlYXJzcxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  WeaRSS allows you to follow all of your favorite news sources and have the headlines sent right to your Android Wear device! Keep up to date with all the news you care about by quickly scanning through headlines right on your wrist. Just copy RSS urls from your favorite websites to build a list of feeds to follow.<p>-- The Read List --<br>You can send headlines from your wearable to your phone for reading later! As you're reading through your headlines on Android Wear, just swipe up to get the "Read this later" button. Tap and the article will be sent back to WeaRSS to the "Read List." Save any number of articles to read later!</p><p>-- Features: --<br>- Follow any number of RSS/Atom feeds.<br>- Headlines and a brief description will get sent to your device - you'll see the most recent headlines first.<br>- Choose how frequently headlines get synced.<br>- Choose how many headlines from each feed will be sent with each update.<br>- Send articles to from your wearable to the "Read List" for reading the full article later.<br>- Open articles in your mobile browser individually or all at once.<br>- Single or multi-deletion of Read List articles once you've read them.<br>- Choose what happens when you tap on Read List items in the settings.</p><p>Opening via voice control is supported! After you've brought up the "OK, Google" voice input screen, just say "Open App My Headlines". The app will open showing you the headlines that have been synced to your device.</p><p>-- Need help adding feeds? --<br>Check out my website for a tutorial on how to get feeds into WeaRSS: http://creativedrewy.com</p><p>Feature requests? Bugs? Please don't give a low rating! Help me make this the app you want to use. Email me with your comments, questions, anything.</p><p>Enjoy!</p><p><br>Thanks to Cyril Mottier for the Android Wear device frame graphics for wearable href="/store/apps/details?id=com.economist.worldin" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.economist.worldin" title="The World in 2015"> 470.    The World in 2015  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=The+Economist+Newspaper+Limited" title="The Economist Newspaper Limited">The Economist Newspaper Limited</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.economist.worldin"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5lY29ub21pc3Qud29ybGRpbhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The World in 2015, the latest in The Economist's annual collection of predictions, identifies and explores the issues that will shape the year ahead. Prominent figures from politics and economics, join together with those from the world of journalism and the arts, to offer their insight for 2015. The World in 2015 will look ahead to a year of economic reforms (as few governments face the distraction of an election) and political adjustment (not least to a newly assertive Russia and a rising China). With commodity prices fluctuating wildly, this could give rise to an economic deficit in some countries, in turn fuelling both economic and political upheaval. This could also have an adverse effect on the equity market which could force a change in the political landscape of those countries most exposed to recession and suffering from economic deficit.<p>Political figures such as Joko Widodo and Matteo Renzi outline their plans for reforms, Hillary Clinton focuses on closing the gender gap and David Blaine reassures us that magic can still amaze.</p><p>For much of 2015, the world’s divisions will draw the most attention. While some economies are moving ahead, others are in danger of slipping back into recession or experiencing a fiscal deficit. Nationalism is on the rise even as the West argues over how to respond to a rogue Russia and rampant jihadists. The West will have to balance its concerns over Saudi Arabia's human rights record with the immediate concerns of counter-terrorism and regional stability within the area. It remains to be seen how independent King Salman will operate from the previous regime but his economic and political leverage will remain undiminished.</p><p>Journalism in 2015 will continue to be under the microscope. Whether it's the right of journalism to express itself freely and be independent of political control or the dangers of reporting from war torn countries where – thanks to their insight – we see the human tragedy of politics as it’s played out in the streets.</p><p>In a time of rising tax and recession it isn’t all gloom though, sporting and speed records could be broken and cinema-goers will delight in a new Bond movie and a new Star Wars sequel too. NASA’s New Horizons spacecraft will also give us a fleeting glimpse of Pluto.</p><p>Key Features include:<br>- Specific, numerate and opinionated predictions<br>- Uniquely authoritative predictions of trends and events<br>- Insight from a range of influential contributors (listed below)<br>- Video content <br>- Written articles<br>- Global insight</p><p>The app offers free access to a small selection of articles; within the app you can pay to access the full index of articles and video. </p><p>Enjoy independent insight for 2015 from a top index of contributors from the world of journalism, economics and politics. Contributors include:<br> <br>- Bill Gates, American business magnate<br>- Hillary Clinton, US Senator and First lady<br>- Matteo Renzi, Prime Minister of Italy <br>- Joko Widodo, President of Indonesia<br>- David Blaine, World famous magician<br>- Carl Icahn, Investor and activist<br>- Michelle Bachelet, President of Chile</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.economist.worldin" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.economist.worldin" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 3.5 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 70.65502166748047%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.economist.worldin"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5lY29ub21pc3Qud29ybGRpbhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> title="联合早报"> 474.    联合早报  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Singapore+Press+Holdings" title="Singapore Press Holdings">Singapore Press Holdings</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.zb.sph.zaobaosingapore"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS56Yi5zcGguemFvYmFvc2luZ2Fwb3JlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  在华文媒体世界享有卓越声誉的《联合早报》推出手机app为读者带来阅读新体验。&nbsp;&nbsp;<p>《联合早报》手机app让读者能够阅读《联合早报》原汁原味的新闻内容和报纸版面,获知每天发生的国内外大事。&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>《联合早报》手机app提供的新闻内容包括:即时新闻、新加坡新闻、中国新闻、财经新闻、东南亚新闻、国际新闻、言论、体育新闻、副刊。&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>《联合早报》由新加坡报业控股公司出版,属新加坡主要华文综合性日报,前身是1923年创刊的《南洋商报》和1929年创刊的《星洲日报》。1983年,这两家历史悠久的报章合并,共同出版了《南洋·星洲联合早报》,简称《联合早报》。&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>《联合早报》被公认是一份素质高、负责任、报道客观、言论公正、可信度高的报纸,对中国和区域的发展采取积极、客观的报道态度,在华人世界中享有崇高的信誉。&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>订户可享有以下服务：&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>• 通过手机app浏览当日（新加坡时间凌晨6点30分）发布的PDF格式（电子报）《联合早报》印刷版内容；&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>• 每天从上午7时到晚上9时之间不断更新的“即时报道”；&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>• 过去七天的早报报纸新闻存档；&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>• 重大突发新闻发生时进行推送提醒；&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>如有疑问或反馈，请电邮到zbocs@sph.com.sg&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><br>Subscribers get full access to:&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>• Lianhe Zaobao as published every morning (6.30am Singapore Time) via the Android PDF edition&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>• Updated news from 7am to 9pm daily with the "Breaking News" section&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>• 7 days archive PDF for Android Edition&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>• Push Notifications for the "Breaking News"&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>Have questions or feedback on the iPhone Lianhe Zaobao App? Kênh14  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=VCCORP" title="VCCORP">VCCORP</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="vcc.mobilenewsreader.kenh14"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJQojEiEKG3ZjYy5tb2JpbGVuZXdzcmVhZGVyLmtlbmgxNBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Đây là ứng dụng  đọc tin chính thức của Kênh 14 được công ty Cổ phần Truyền Thông Việt Nam (Vietnam Communications Corporation) phát hành. <br>Với thông tin đa dạng ở mọi lĩnh vực đang được giới trẻ quan tâm, Kênh14 đã là cái tên quá đỗi thân thuộc với hàng chục triệu độc giả trong và ngoài nước - trở thành website số 1 dành cho thế hệ trẻ Việt Nam. Đội ngũ Paparazzi - Kênh14 luôn sẵn sàng 24 giờ trên 7 ngày để săn tin trên từng cây số, với tiêu chí nhanh nhất, mới nhất được các bạn trẻ quan tâm, đón đọc hàng ngày hàng giờ.<br> Ứng dụng đọc tin Kenh14 trên smartphone luôn được update tin tức liên tục, kịp thời, đón đầu xu hướng giới trẻ. Với giao diện trẻ trung, thân thiện, dự đoán ứng dụng đọc tin kênh 14 sẽ là sự bùng nổ trào lưu đọc tin trên smartphone đối với thế hệ trẻ. <br>Các tính năng chính của ứng dụng đọc tin Kênh14:<br>•	Thiết kế đẹp.<br>•	Update tin mới tự động, liên tục.<br>•	Tin tức hiển thị theo thứ tự mới nhất hoặc theo chuyên mục.<br>•	Hình ảnh được điều chỉnh phù hợp với màn hình smartphone, xem ảnh qua sile.<br>•	Bình luận, cập nhật trao đổi tin tức dễ dàng, nhanh chóng<br>•	Chia sẻ tin tức qua Email, FaceBook, Twitter, Linkhay.<br>•	Thao tác lướt trên màn hình mượt mà giúp đọc tin nhanh. 軟體遊戲商店推薦、Android Cool Apps等，讓大家可以快速又方便的獲得APP資訊。</p><p>「就醬玩APP」臉書粉絲團:https://www.facebook.com/iplayapp</p><p>有非推不可的APP嗎？有想讓全世界的人都知道的好用APP嗎？</p><p>獨樂樂不如眾樂樂，廣召大家一起來互動分享自己喜愛的APP。</p><p>【APP 廣告宣傳平台介紹】</p><p>「就醬玩App」另外提供完全免費的廣告宣傳平台，歡迎APP開發者來張貼宣傳自己的 APP，讓 APP發光發熱。</p><p>張貼方式很簡單，只要到 「就醬玩App」 臉書粉絲團「https://www.facebook.com/iplayapp」，按讚然後留下想要分享介紹的APP，符合張貼規範，經審核通過，小編即會擇期將此 APP 排程上架到「就醬玩App」來行銷宣傳。</p><p><br>就醬玩App 臉書粉絲團，留言範例:<br>=======================================<br>【軟體名稱】:熊讚生活通 (必填)</p><p>【Google Play 網址】: (選填)<br>=======================================</p><p>張貼規範:<br>請勿在短時間大量重複張貼灌水廣告APP內容。<br>請勿張貼具有誹謗、威脅、攻擊、功能尚未完善或侵害他人權益的APP內容。<br>請勿張貼字詞不雅、謾罵、淫穢猥褻、色情等違背善良風俗的APP內容。<br>請勿張貼對於性別、宗教或是種族等相關面向的歧視內容的APP內容。<br>請勿張貼從事非法或是不法交易行為、虛假不實、引人犯罪的APP內容。<br>請勿張貼販售槍枝、毒品、禁藥、盜版或是仿冒品等違禁物的APP內容。</p><p>為了提供一個便利又舒適的APP廣告宣傳行銷環境，「就醬玩APP」擁有最後的修改權力，<br>並可依實際情況予以增刪、修訂變更內容 立法院官方行動應用(App)服務，提供下列資訊：<br>1.	資訊查閱：<br>(1)	立法委員：包含立法委員簡介、學歷、經歷及通訊處等相關資訊。<br>(2)	最新通過議案：包含通過日期、議案名稱、會次、全文及公布條文等相<br>關資訊。<br>(3)	立法統計：包含各屆別會期通過之法律案、廢止案、預決算案、其他及<br>本院內規等議案。<br>(4)	最新資訊：包含立法委員、各單位及各委員會最新消息。<br>2.	會議資訊：<br>(1)	會議查詢及相關議案資訊：包含日期時間、會議室、會議名稱、主審委員會/申請單位、相關議案等資訊。<br>(2)	會議紀要：提供立法院會議之會議別、會議內容及決議/決定相關資訊。<br>3.	議案資訊：提供立法院最新出版資訊包含議事日程及關係文書、議事錄及公報。<br>4.	立院專區：提供立法委員、助理及院內同仁於內部網路進行查詢相關業<br>務資訊包含每日新聞、公報初稿、委員會議發言名單、訊息服務(最新消息、委員公文訊息、委員留言板、委員個人新聞、咨請公布法案、酬酢品作業通知及派車資訊)、立院通訊錄、及入口網站行事曆等資訊。 Ajoutez les rubriques qui vous intéressent pour créer votre propre Une, avec plus d’une trentaine de rubriques disponibles (Politique, bourse, économie, sport, international, culture, immobilier…)<br> <br>LE FLASH : Profitez des trois flashs thématiques qui vous tiennent informé des événements et de l’actualité en continu (Actu, Economie, Sport).<br>VIDEOS : toujours plus de vidéos avec Le Figaro.tv et ses émissions phares : le Zapping, le Talk, le Buzz…<br> <br>PREMIUM : bénéficiez de l’intégralité des articles du Figaro quotidien et de ses magazines. En exclusivité et en avant-première, découvrez les reportages, les enquêtes et les analyses des grandes signatures du Figaro.<br>        	<br>LES ALERTES : Restez au cœur de l’info où que vous soyez grâce aux alertes de la rédaction qui vous informent en temps réel des dernières actualités majeures.<br> <p>&gt; Partout avec vous, accédez à l’ensemble des rubriques du Figaro.fr et suivez l’info en continu :</p><p>• Actualité : Retrouvez toute l’actu en direct, avec Le Figaro<br>• Politique : Avec Le Figaro, restez informés de l’actu politique<br>• Economie : Suivez toute l’actualité économique avec Le Figaro<br>• Société : Retrouvez l’actualité des débats sociétaux ainsi que les débats d’opinion<br>• International : Avec Le Figaro, suivez les dernières news de l’actualité internationale<br>• Bourse : Suivez en direct l’actualité du monde de la finance et de la bourse<br>• Sport : Retrouvez les news sportives : l’actualité du football, l’actu du rugby, l’actualité du tennis et l’actu de la F1<br>• Culture : Découvrez avec Le Figaro, l’actualité de la culture. Retrouvez les dernières news du cinéma, l’actualité de la musique et l’actu des dernières expositions.<br>• Lifestyle : Retrouvez avec Le Figaro, l’actu de l’automobile ainsi que des conseils sorties et gastronomies.<br> </p><p><br>&gt; Votre application « sur mesure »</p><p>Personnalisez votre application avec les sujets d’actu qui vous intéressent, organisez les rubriques et les types d’alertes en fonction de vos centres d’intérêt.<br>• Choisissez vos rubriques favorites et accéder plus rapidement à l’information qui vous intéresse,<br>• Sélectionnez les thèmes pour lesquels vous souhaitez recevoir en temps réel les alertes de la rédaction,<br>• Utilisez le moteur de recherche de l’application, pour retrouver l’ensemble des articles ou sujets en lien avec votre recherche,<br>• Sauvegardez vos contenus préférés en un clic grâce à l'onglet "Mes favoris" ; pour les lire ou les relire à votre convenance, lorsque vous en aurez le temps.<br> </p><p><br>&gt; Une nouvelle façon de suivre l’actualité :vivez l’actu en vidéos et en images avec les diaporamas et reportages proposés par la Rédaction.</p><p>• Visionnez les vidéos d’actualité politique, économique, internationale et culturelle ainsi que les émissions hebdomadaires sur la chaîne FIGARO.TV<br>• Soyez informé de l’actualité à travers des diaporamas et visualisez les clichés les plus étonnants dans notre sélection 24h Photos<br>• Partagez les dernières actualités (articles, flash infos et diaporamas) avec vos amis par e-mail, sur Facebook ou Twitter.<br> </p><p><br>&gt; LeFigaro.fr adapté à votre smartphone et tablette :</p><p>• Le défilement latéral vous permet de naviguer en toute simplicité entre les pages de l’application,<br>• Profitez de l’information même hors connexion grâce à la fonction « Tout télécharger »<br>• En mode portrait ou paysage, profitez de l’information avec un vrai confort de lecture,<br>• Ajustez la taille du texte selon vos envies pour une lecture toujours plus agréable.</p><p>Partagez les articles ou recommandez l'application par e-mail, sur Facebook ou sur Twitter. Faites nous part de vos remarques et suggestions en nous contactant à l’adresse suivante : mobilite@lefigaro.fr</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span By analyzing what you enjoy, News360 becomes smarter as you use it and selects stories that you’ll find interesting and important. You will never again miss something because you haven’t subscribed to the right feed or followed the right person – instead, News360 will show you all the stories that really matter, and none of the noise.<p>The New York Times: «News360 has to be one of the better news aggregating [apps] I’ve seen on any platform»</p><p>PERSONALIZE THE NEWS<br>A flexible and smart personalization system allows you to tailor the news as you want it. TVニュースを手のひらに！速報も届く！"> 500.    テレ朝news+ / TVニュースを手のひらに！速報も届く！  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TV+Asahi+Corporation" title="TV Asahi Corporation">TV Asahi Corporation</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.fenrir.tvAsahiNews"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGpwLmNvLmZlbnJpci50dkFzYWhpTmV3cxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  テレビ朝日のニュースを「スマホ最適化」！<br>TVニュース動画だけでなく、注目の記者会見などはノーカットの動画で配信するなど、放送の枠を超えたコンテンツをお届けします。<p>◆防災情報やニュース速報をプッシュ通知<br>アプリを開いていない時でも、地震、津波などの安全にかかわる情報やニュース速報など、重要な情報を素早くお知らせします。<br>受け取りたい情報の種類を選んで設定することができます。<br>・災害情報：地震速報（震度5弱以上）、津波警報・注意報、気象特別警報、火山噴火警報、東海地震予知情報など。<br>・ニュース速報：テレビ局ならではの迅速な速報を配信します。<br>・テレ朝イチオシ：テレビ朝日の番組などに関連した耳寄りな情報</p><p>◆交通の乱れなども一目で<br>アプリ内ではさらに天候不順による交通の乱れやライフラインの情報などをお知らせします。</p><p>◆ニュース番組さながらの連続再生<br>注目ニュースを連続して再生し、テレビのニュース番組のように視聴できます。</p><p>◆動画ニュース以外にも多彩な情報<br>・芸能ニュース<br>テレビ朝日の芸能記者らが独自に取材・編集した芸能ニュース</p><p>・テレ朝イチオシ<br>ドラマ、バラエティ、アニメ、スポーツなど、テレビ朝日の番組に関連した耳寄りなコンテンツ情報も満載</p><p>・天気<br>きょうの天気や気温、降水確率はもちろん、花粉、紫外線、肌荒れ、洗濯など、生活に役立つ情報も一目でわかります。</p><p>◆圏外になっても使える<br>アプリを立ち上げると各リスト内の記事の詳細ページ（通常60本の記事テキスト）が読み込まれ、地下などで圏外になって通信が途絶えても閲覧できます。</p><p>◆操作性・デザインへのこだわり<br>あらゆる状況・場面でも片手で扱うことを考慮した設計。<br>画面を左右に指でなぞるとページがスムーズに切り替わり、サクサクとニュースが読めます。スマートフォンサイトに比べ、一段と便利でストレスを感じない作りになっています。</p><p>◆文字の大きさが選べる<br>お好みに応じて画面の文字の大きさを大、小2段階から選んでニュースを読むことができます。</p><p>◆お気に入り・共有<br>後でまた読みたいニュース記事を30本までアプリ内に保存できます。<br>Facebookや Twitter、メールでの共有もスムーズ。</p><p><br>▼テレ朝news<br>http://news.tv-asahi.co.jp/</p><p>▼テレ朝newsアプリ紹介<br>http://news.tv-asahi.co.jp/sp_contents/app/</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> ウルトラマン公式アプリby円谷プロ  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TSUBURAYA+PRODUCTIONS+CO.,+LTD." data-server-cookie="CAIaGAoWEhQKDmpwLm03OC5zaHV3YXBwEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  「シュワップ！」はウルトラマンに関する円谷プロ公式の最新情報をお届けする無料アプリです。<br>更新情報を「ウルトラサイン」(プッシュ通知)でいち早くお届けします。<br>ウルトラヒーロー、怪獣・星人たちが各記事のコメント欄に現れるかも…！？<p>■最新情報を“ウルトラサイン”でいち早くチェック！<br>「シュワップ！」では、最新情報の更新を“ウルトラサイン”でお知らせ。<br>あなたのスマートフォンに“ウルトラサイン”がプッシュ通知として届きます。<br>Twitter、Facebookでのシェアにも対応。<br>誰よりも早くウルトラヒーローの最新情報を共有したいあなたにオススメのアプリです。</p><p>■「シュワップ！」オリジナルコンテンツを配信！<br>人気のタブ式表示でウルトラマンの最新情報をカテゴライズ。<br>「シュワップ!」のみで配信するオリジナルコンテンツ用のタブもご用意してます。<br>アプリをダウンロードして更新をチェックしてください。</p><p>■コメントをしてランクアップを狙おう！<br>最新情報に対して、コメントを書き込んでランクアップを目指しましょう。<br>ランクが一定に達すると称号を得ることが出来ます。<br>コメントが「いいね！」と思ったら<br>「シュワッ！」ボタンを押して評価する機能も搭載。</p><p>ランクを上げながら楽しくアプリを利用してください。</p><p>■ウルトラマンや怪獣・星人も愛用！？</p><p>ウルトラマンタロウ、ウルトラの父によるアプリ紹介ムービーを準備中です。</p><p>打倒ウルトラヒーローをもくろむウルトラ怪獣や星人達も<br>怪獣・星人バージョンの「シュワップ！」を利用して<br>ウルトラマンの最新情報をチェックしているのだとか…。</p><p>各記事のコメント欄に、ウルトラヒーロー、怪獣・星人たちが現れるかも…！？</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Tin Tức: Doc Bao Tin Tuc Viet  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=TINI.VN+Co+Ltd" title="TINI.VN Co Ltd">TINI.VN Co Ltd</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="vn.tini.apps.news"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEXZuLnRpbmkuYXBwcy5uZXdzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Tin Tức - Doc Bao Viet là ứng dụng hỗ trợ bạn cập nhật, đọc những tin tức, tin mới nóng hổi nhất từ hơn 70 nguồn báo mạng uy tín. Tin Tức được thiết kế theo phong cách hiện đại mới nhất hiện nay. Ưu điểm nổi bật nhất là tốc độ tải nhanh đến mức kinh ngạc nhờ tận dụng những công nghệ truyền tải dữ liệu mới nhất.<p>NHỮNG TÍNH NĂNG NỔI BẬT:</p><p>- Được tổng hợp và tối ưu nhờ và phần mềm máy tinh ưu việt giúp các tin tức mới phân chia theo chuyên mục tổng hợp thời sự nóng nhất hiện tại ngoài việc phân chia theo nguồn tin tức như những ứng dụng khác.<br>- Thiết kế trực quan giành tối đa không gian cho tin tức bằng việc trong suốt thanh hành động, ẩn khi không cần thiết.<br>- Tính năng lưu tin giúp lưu lại những tin tức cần thiết tùy mục đích người đọc.<br>- Chia sẽ tin tức đến bất cư đâu cho bất cứ ai mà bạn muốn.<br>- Dữ liệu được đồng bộ hóa với hệ thống một cách thông minh nhằm tránh cảm giác chờ đợi tải tin.<br>- Tìm kiếm tin tức theo yêu cầu người đọc.<br>- Nhiều phong cách đọc báo để lựa chọn.<br>- Hiệu ứng hình ảnh động giúp bạn đọc báo sinh động và thú vị hơn.<br>- Danh sách truy cập báo nhanh bên phải giúp bạn tiết kiệm thời gian chuyển đổi các nguồn báo.<br>- Nguồn tin tức phong phú tổng hợp từ hơn 70 báo điện tử uy tín: VnExpress, Dân trí, Zing News, VietnamNet, 24h, Tiền phong Online, Tinh tế, Công an nhân dân, Ngôi sao, Afamily, Số Hóa, Genk, …<br>- Hiện tại không có bất cứ quảng cáo nào trên app. Nhưng sau này nếu cần quảng cáo để duy trì chúng tôi cam kết sẽ quảng cáo một cách khoa học, không giăng quảng cáo khắp nơi gây khó chịu cho người sử dụng.</p><p>Liên hệ hỗ trợ: apps@tini.vn</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=vn.tini.apps.news" aria-hidden="true" Windows Central — The app!  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Mobile+Nations" title="Mobile Nations">Mobile Nations</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.wpcentral.app"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS53cGNlbnRyYWwuYXBwEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This is the Android app for WindowsCentral.com. (Formerly WPCentral and WMExperts!) C'mon, you know you read us. A few of you might have even hacked Android onto an HTC HD2 at some point. How great was that phone, right? <p>Anyway. Here we are. All the stories, editorials, reviews and everything else you get from our site — now in a handy Android app. Plus you'll get:</p><p>★ Widgets for the home screen and lock screen. Never seen a widget before? Don't worry — they're not that scary.<br>★ Comment on stories. We know you want to.<br>★ Tip us to news stories. Seen Android running on a Nokia phone? Here's a great way to send us a pic. Or a selfie. Because we love selfies. Especially with duckface.<br>★ Full access to the WPC Forums. You can also find duckface selfies here in addition to excellent WP help.<br>★ Videos: Watch every video we've ever uploaded to YouTube. Quite possibly even a few duckface selfies.<br>★ Podcasts: We've been podcasting forever. You can listen to them here.<br>★ Mobile Nations Passport: You can sign in with your Mobile Nations Passport account to leave comments or to post in the forums. And we're working hard on making this even easier in future versions. Hang tight!<br>★ Modify of delete the contents of your USB storage: This is for storing the images and little thumbnails in the app, so that it doesn't have to download them each and every time. That'd be bad.<br>★ Full network access: Everything we do comes from the Internet. Therefore, this app needs access to the Internet.<br>★ Set wallpaper: Used by, interestingly enough, our wallpaper gallery. Want to download and use a wallpaper from our gallery? You have to have this permission.<br>★ Test access to protected storage: It's possible for USB storage (see the first bullet point here) to be protected. This tests for that and declares that it's testing for that.<br>★ Access Network State: We've added Quantcast and Flurry analytics. We've used Quantcast on the traditional web side of things forever (http://www.quantcast.com/androidcentral.com) as sort of a transparent look at traffic. Flurry gives us an anonymous look at how and where our app is being used, and it'll help us make the app better. More than 300,000 apps use Flurry analytics. You can find out more at http://www.flurry.com/flurry-analytics.html.</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.wpcentral.app" Voice Reading (Read aloud)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=noinnion" title="noinnion">noinnion</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.noinnion.android.voicereading"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5ub2lubmlvbi5hbmRyb2lkLnZvaWNlcmVhZGluZxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Voice Reading is a simple and intuitive app for read aloud text. Using the Android share feature you can send any data from other apps to Voice Reading.<p>Text - Select a text from any apps (e.g. Message, Email, ...) and share it. The text will be read aloud. </p><p>URL - While browsing a page you can share the url to Voice Reading. It will parse the main content and read it for you. It was never easier to read a page. </p><p>File - Voice Reading also accept text files. Share the path and it will read the file content. </p><p>Message: Show notification when new messages arrive. </p><p>Please contact us if you have any questions or problems. And also let us know what we can do to make the app better for you. </p><p>We hope you enjoy Voice Reading.</p><p>Tags: tts , Text to Speech , Talking, Type to Speak, Type and Say, Document Reader, There are three ways to enjoy full access to the Telegraph for Android.</p><p>1) Monthly subscriptions can be purchased for £1.99, and these subscriptions will auto-renew until you choose to cancel.</p><p>NB:</p><p>• Payment will be charged to your Google Play at confirmation of purchase<br>• Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period<br>• Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period<br>• You can manage your subscription and switch off the auto-renewal via your Google Play account settings<br>• You cannot cancel the current subscription during the active subscription period<br>• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription to that publication.</p><p>2) Telegraph newspaper subscribers can use the app by validating their subscriber number and postcode within the app.</p><p>3) Telegraph digital subscribers can use the app by validating their Telegraph Login within the app.</p><p>Please note: if you are an existing subscriber, in some instances you may be asked to revalidate your subscription on launching the app after an update. To do so, select an article, follow the ‘I already have a Telegraph subscription’ link and input either your email address and password (digital subscribers) or your subscriber number and postcode 536.    Goo Books 中古車購入パーフェクトブック  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Proto+Corporation" title="Proto Corporation">Proto Corporation</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.proto.GooBooks"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" 日本初のクルマ・バイク専門電子書籍、それがGoo Booksです!!<p>国内最大級のクルマ情報誌「Goo」、輸入車情報誌「GooWORLD」、そしてバイク情報誌「GooBike」が蓄積している購入ノウハウや新車・中古車情報を、毎週あなたの携帯電話にお届けします。</p><p>■いいクルマを買いたい――そんなあなたにピッタリの情報をご提供します。クルマ探しから購入手続までひととおり知ることができる「クルマ購入パーフェクト電子ブック」、それがGoo Booksです! </p><p>■毎週Gooの注目の車のスペック、価格帯、試乗記事などを配信します。また、国内最大級の情報量を誇る中古車情報サイトGoo-netとシームレスに連携し、最新情報をご提供します。</p><p>■初めてクルマを買う方も安心、購入についての基礎知識をご提供します。</p><p>・車両の見分け方 <br>・契約知識(諸費用) <br>・見積書について <br>・税金 <br>・必要書類等 <br>・価格の考え方 <br>・修復歴について <br>・車検について <br>・チェックシート <br>・etc… </p><p>■ここでしか見られない秘蔵画像が満載です。特定の記事をタップすれば、画像スライドショーが始まります!</p><p>■国産車の最新号は、毎週水曜日にお届けします(期間によって変動することがございます)。 </p><p>■輸入車の最新号は、月2回、月曜日にお届けします(期間によって変動することがございます)。 </p><p>■バイクの最新号は、月2回、月曜日にお届けします(期間によって変動することがございます)。 </p><p>Goo Booksは、クルマやバイクの購入を考えている全てのお客様に、価値ある情報を提供し続けていきたいと願っております。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" 東網巨星是on.cc東網旗下以娛樂為主打的APP，匯集了東方報業集團最強的娛樂資訊，獨家猛料，中港台國際娛樂圈新聞一網打盡。東網巨星不但有全港最快最全面的即時娛樂新聞，還有豐富圖片和影片，以及東網自製的港台娛樂節目，一個APP為你八盡娛樂圈，滿足你所有要求。立即下載東網巨星，將娛樂圈搬入你手機。<p><br>六大娛樂頻道　熱辣話題盡網羅<br>即時新聞、視娛樂、東方日報、太陽報、星星廊、東網Baby，六大娛樂頻道網羅最熱辣的娛樂新聞，圖文影片最豐富。</p><p>即時新聞　娛圈消息無間斷<br>24小時不停更新，圖文並茂，娛樂圈最新動向、熱門話題，即時傳送到你手。</p><p>視娛樂　精彩視頻不停播<br>盡覽東網獨家影片、中外娛聞視頻，八盡娛樂圈最新消息，貼身追蹤明星動向。</p><p>東方日報　娛樂熱話最全面<br>《東方日報》娛樂版新聞每日同步在東網巨星更新，免費任閱覽，獨家猛料不停爆，足不出戶能知中港台和國際娛圈消息。</p><p>太陽報　專訪報道多姿采<br>《太陽報》娛樂版每日同步在東網巨星刊出，免費任閱覽，內容多采多姿，話題最HIT。</p><p>星星廊　細閱明星成長路<br>回顧娛樂偶像巨星的演藝人生路，內容不但有豐富精彩圖輯、背景資料及入行經歷，還有偶像巨星經典造型，讓你慢慢細閱偶像巨星成長路。</p><p>東網Baby　火辣娛女星全輯錄<br>城中最火辣女星的性感訪問，吸晴圖輯、火辣影片，絕不容錯過。</p><p>如有意見，請電郵至：enquiry@on.cc</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p>
